Name: Queenborough
Builder: Swan Hunter and Wigham Richardson at Wallsend-on-Tyne
awards:
Battle honours:
Arctic 1942–43
Sicily 1943
Salerno 1943
Mediterranean 1943
Okinawa 1945


Battle honours:
Malaya 1957
Fate:
Transferred to Royal Australian Navy
Sold for scrap
Range:
4,680 nautical miles (8,670 km) at 20 knots (37 km/h)
4,040 nautical miles (7,480 km) at 16 knots (30 km/h)
Armament:
4 × single 4.7 inch QF guns
1 × quadruple QF 2-pounder pom-pom
6 × Oerlikon 20 mm cannons
2 × 4 torpedo tubes firing 21 inch (533 mm) torpedoes
4 × depth-charge throwers


1 × twin 4-inch HA/LA gun
1 × twin Bofors 40 mm gun
1 × Limbo anti-submarine mortar
